channel.title: Black screen now, read below
channel.description:
Hey guys. So everything I've done has been offline. It was working perfectly until I edited shops in shops.cfg. Ever since I compiled the work I've done, when I type a user/pass I get blackscreened. My source says..
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 17
at ItemHandler.loadItemList(Itemhandler.java:283) at ItemHandler.(init)(ItemHandler.java:173) at server.main(server.java:112)
Not sure if all of that is normal, but now I can't login. But before I compiled, it was all working smooth. I tried erasing that shop's items, recompiling, but same thing. I don't really have internet access (I'm on my phone). Am I screwed?

item.title: Black screen now, read below
item.dc:creator: @FailureToComply FailureToComply
item.description:
@FailureToComply wrote:

Well I’m not that great of a coder and that’s really all I compiled? I have no idea I think that I’m gonna get rid of it anyways. It kind of sucked but it was the only one of 10 I downloaded that worked without “error connecting to server” offline even if the cache was via dropbox it still didn’t work. Made sure the runs worked properly too.

Read full topic

item.title: Black screen now, read below
item.dc:creator: @Runecessor Runecessor
item.description:
@Runecessor wrote:

What other files did you change when compiling?

also just for future reference keep a backup of your files for this reason, and/ or leave the notepad windows open so you can simply “Ctrl-Z” the problem and re-compile for the fix.

But the answer is no this is not normal because if it was you wouldn’t have a problem now would you? lol
and the second answer is no you are not screwed. where there is a will there is a way.

Read full topic
